subject: Hockey, Ice
Lockouts
lead_paragraph: Voting began on Thursday to reauthorize the executive director of the N.H.L. players’ association to effectively dissolve the union, opening the way for players to file antitrust suits against the league.
snippet: Voting began on Thursday to reauthorize the executive director of the N.H.L. players’ association to effectively dissolve the union, opening the way for players to file antitrust suits against the league.
